superior.title: Superior Room
superior.description: Succumb to the Superior Room. On the ground floor, it offers direct access to the garden and the superb swimming pool. It communicates via the terrace with an adjoining room to accommodate your entire family.

deluxe.title: Deluxe Room
deluxe.description: Located on an upper floor, the Deluxe Room, 46 m², overlooks the pool from its vast terrace. Very bright and spacious, it offers a large bathroom with shower and bathtub, open to the main room.

juniorSuite.title: Junior Suite Deluxe
juniorSuite.description: Two bathrooms for more privacy, a spacious dressing room, a lounge area and a designer office space. Flooded with light from its large terrace, the Junior Suite Deluxe, 54m², ensures absolute comfort.

suite.title: Suite
suite.description: Flows of light pass through the glass doors opening onto a double terrace. The living room with convertible sofa, the deckchairs facing the pool, the dressing room and the spacious bathroom invite family relaxation.

suiteRyad.title: Riad Suite
suiteRyad.description: The Riad Suite has a separate living room with a sofa bed, a bathroom with shower and bathtub, a patio and a private rooftop terrace offering a panoramic view of the medina.

suiteRoyale.title: Royal Suite
suiteRoyale.description: A 60m² terrace, 2 bedrooms with their private bathroom and a 70m² living room with a convertible sofa lend themselves to unforgettable family moments.

ryad3.title: Riad 3 bedrooms
ryad3.description: Combine the services of a luxury hotel with the intimacy of a private Riad. 3 bedrooms with bathroom, 2 living rooms, 2 terraces, a private pool, and the discreet service of a butler, this is what awaits you in this riad.

ryad4.title: Riad 4 bedrooms
ryad4.description: Ideal for large families or stays with friends, this 250m² riad consists of 4 bedrooms and as many bathrooms, 2 living rooms and a vast 100m² terrace, home to a delightful private pool.

ryad6.title: Riad 6 bedrooms
ryad6.description: A private pool on the edge of a huge 200m² terrace whose light floods 4 living rooms. 6 bedrooms and as many bathrooms and a fitted kitchen. Privacy is preserved in this 450m² riad.

hero.title: Gallery
hero.subtitle: Discover the atmosphere of Riad Alassala through curated photos and day & night ambiances.

day.title: Day Ambiance
day.description: Sunlit courtyards, traditional details and warm colors revealing the riad's architecture.

night.title: Night Ambiance
night.description: An intimate, peaceful atmosphere with lanterns and soft lighting.

dining.title: DINING
dining.description: Authentic Moroccan cuisine in an elegant setting, from the patio fountain to the rooftop with panoramic views.

hero.title: Dining
hero.subtitle: Authentic Moroccan cuisine in an elegant setting, from the patio fountain to the rooftop with panoramic views.

intro.title: Dining
intro.subtitle: Authentic Moroccan cuisine in an elegant setting, from the patio fountain to the rooftop with panoramic views.
intro.description: Discover the subtle alliance between traditional French cuisine and Moroccan gastronomy. A rich brunch awaits you at Le Verdoyant on certain Sundays. In an enchanting setting inspired by the desert, the rooftop offers a selection of delicious wines and cocktails. For everyone...

ourCuisine.title: Our Cuisine
ourCuisine.text: At Riad Alassala Fes, every meal is a celebration of authentic Moroccan cuisine. Fassi heritage, local flavors, and a refined atmosphere come together to create an unforgettable experience, under the starry skies of Fes or by the gentle Tinkling Fountain.

leVerdoyant.title: Le Verdoyant
leVerdoyant.text: The menu at Le Verdoyant celebrates the excellence of Moroccan cuisine. Every dish, crafted with fresh, seasonal, locally sourced ingredients, creatively reinterprets traditional Fassi recipes. Flavors intertwine, textures surprise, and colors delight, offering a true culinary journey where authenticity and modernity meet in every bite.

fountain.title: The Fountain, Heart of the Experience
fountain.text: At the heart of the riad's patio, the central fountain of Le Verdoyant gently accompanies each meal with its soothing murmur. Surrounded by lush greenery and Moroccan artisanal details, it transforms the patio into an intimate and serene sanctuary. Every table becomes a refuge where guests can fully savor the richness of the dishes in a timeless, elegant setting.

rooftop.title: Rooftop Experience
rooftop.text: Perched atop Riad Alassala Fes, the rooftop offers panoramic vistas over the ancient city and the Atlas Mountains. At La Table Panoramique and Fez From Above, each meal becomes a journey: authentic Moroccan cuisine crafted with fresh, seasonal ingredients, signature cocktails, Moroccan tea and local delicacies, all in a refined rooftop ambiance where gastronomy and the panorama harmonize.

breakfast.title: Breakfast — A Morning in the Heart of Fes
breakfast.text: Each morning, your stay includes a table-served breakfast as part of our B&B offering. Enjoy it in the patio, by the fountain, bathed in soft light. Fresh breads and pastries, flaky msemmen, Moroccan pancakes, artisanal jams and honey, seasonal fruits, freshly pressed juices, and aromatic teas and coffees infused with local spices. A warm, sensory moment where tradition and comfort meet.

presentation.title: Our Cuisine
presentation.description: At Riad Alassala Fes, every meal is a celebration of authentic Moroccan cuisine. Fassi heritage, local flavors, and a refined atmosphere come together to create an unforgettable experience, under the starry skies of Fes or by the gentle Tinkling Fountain.

concept.title: Culinary Philosophy
concept.description: We believe in simple, generous cuisine inspired by local recipes. Every dish is prepared using fresh ingredients sourced from local markets and crafted with attention to authenticity.

rooftop.title: Rooftop Experience
rooftop.description: Enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner on our rooftop terrace with panoramic views over the old medina. A peaceful setting for memorable moments.

breakfastPage.title: Breakfast
breakfastPage.description: Start your day with a homemade breakfast including fresh bread, pastries, seasonal fruit, Moroccan specialties and hot drinks prepared to order.

menu.title: Menu (PDF)
menu.description: Discover our homemade dishes inspired by Moroccan tradition and prepared daily with fresh produce.

leVerdoyant.name: Le Verdoyant
leVerdoyant.description: In a dream setting by the pool, Le Verdoyant restaurant offers refined and flavorful Mediterranean cuisine.

nupharBar.name: Nuphar Bar
nupharBar.description: The Nuphar Bar offers you a variety of beverages from fine wine to the best champagne in an enchanting setting.

brunch.name: Brunch in an Oasis
brunch.description: A rich brunch awaits you at Le Verdoyant on certain Sundays.

roomService.title: In-Room Dining Service
roomService.description: Enjoy the best of Riad Alassala Fes gastronomy in the intimacy of your room, suite or private riad. Our in-room dining service is available 24/7 and offers a selection of locavore, Mediterranean and seasonal dishes by Chef Hamza Alquir.

wardya.title: Le Wardya
wardya.description: In a dream setting by the pool, Le Wardya restaurant offers refined and flavorful Mediterranean cuisine.

lounge.title: Pool Lounge
lounge.description: A friendly space to enjoy fresh cocktails and light cuisine throughout the day.

bar.title: Le Bar
bar.description: An elegant bar offering a selection of signature cocktails and fine wines in a refined atmosphere.

terrace.title: Panoramic Terrace
terrace.description: Enjoy a unique culinary experience on our terrace with stunning views of the gardens and medina.

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.description: Start your day with a hearty breakfast featuring fresh local products in an elegant setting.

hero.title: Experiences
hero.subtitle: Discover authentic journeys, guided tours, cultural encounters and outdoor adventures starting from Riad Alassala.

intro.text: From guided medina tours to full-day excursions and multi-day adventures across Morocco, Riad Alassala offers authentic, safe and memorable experiences tailored for our guests. All trips are operated with trusted local partners and certified guides.

excursions.title: Journeys Beyond the Medina
excursions.subtitle: Discover Morocco through guided excursions, cultural landmarks and natural landscapes.

workshops.title: Artisan & Culinary Experiences
workshops.subtitle: Hands-on experiences connecting you with the crafts and flavors of Fes.

medinaTour.title: Guided Tour of the Medina of Fes
medinaTour.description: Discover the UNESCO Medina of Fes with a certified guide. Visit historical monuments, artisanal workshops, narrow souks and cultural landmarks.

chefchaouen.title: Day Trip to Chefchaouen
chefchaouen.description: A full-day escape to the Blue Pearl of Morocco. Wander the blue alleys, discover artisan shops, panoramic viewpoints and charming cafés.

meknesVolubilis.title: Day Trip to Meknes, Moulay Idriss & Volubilis
meknesVolubilis.description: Visit the imperial city of Meknes, the sacred town of Moulay Idriss and the Roman ruins of Volubilis. A cultural journey into Morocco's rich history.

desertMerzouga.title: 3-Day Desert Trip (Fes → Merzouga → Marrakech)
desertMerzouga.description: A 3-day desert adventure including camel trekking, starry desert night, traditional dinner, 4×4 transport, dunes, oases and stunning landscapes.

middleAtlas.title: Fes & Middle Atlas Trekking Trip
middleAtlas.description: A multi-day trekking adventure through cedar forests, Berber villages, mountain valleys and natural springs around the Middle Atlas.

chefchaouenTrekking.title: Fes & Chefchaouen Trekking Trip
chefchaouenTrekking.description: A beautiful trekking route combining mountain landscapes with the charm of Chefchaouen.

cookingClass.title: Cooking & Baking Classes
cookingClass.description: A hands-on Moroccan cooking class including market visit, traditional recipes, bread baking and lunch.

tasteOfFes.title: Cooking Classes – Discover Moroccan Culinary Heritage
tasteOfFes.description: The Taste of Fes — Immerse yourself in the rich flavors of Moroccan cuisine with a hands-on 3-hour masterclass. Begin your journey at the local street market, selecting fresh ingredients with your host while picking up a few Arabic phrases along the way. Back at the riad, learn the secrets of Moroccan spices, techniques, and flavors as you prepare an authentic Fassi dish. A unique culinary experience to treasure forever. Sample Menu: Moroccan salads, Pastilla & Briouates, Tagines, Couscous

moroccanTeaChallenge.title: Moroccan Tea Challenge
moroccanTeaChallenge.description: Dive into the world of Moroccan tea with our expert guidance. Master the art of brewing the perfect pot and savor it alongside a selection of exquisite homemade Moroccan sweets.

artOfMoroccanPastry.title: The Art of Moroccan Pastry
artOfMoroccanPastry.description: Discover the secrets of Moroccan pastries in a half-day workshop with our passionate pastry chef. Learn to craft Briouates, Kaab Ghzal, Ghriba, and other traditional delights while exploring the artistry and culture behind each creation.

artisanWorkshops.title: Artisan Workshops – The Soul of Fes in Your Hands
artisanWorkshops.description: Step into the heart of Fes and discover the city's timeless crafts. Guided by master artisans, each workshop invites you to connect with centuries of Moroccan heritage, exploring techniques that have been passed down through generations: Zellige & Tile Art – design and craft your own mosaic, a miniature piece of Fes to treasure. Pottery & Ceramics – shape, paint, and breathe life into clay using authentic Fassi methods. Calligraphy – dance with the elegance of Arabic script, capturing the poetry of the written word. Every experience is more than a workshop — it's a journey for the senses, an intimate connection to craftsmanship, and a keepsake that embodies the essence of Fes.

contact.title: Would you like to book an experience or customize your trip?

contact.address: Rue Djebel Alakhdar - Bab Doukkala 40000 Marrakech

form.title: SEND US A MESSAGE
form.subtitle: We'll get back to you as soon as possible
form.name: NAME
form.subject: SUBJECT

sejour.question: Can I request a late checkout?
sejour.answer: Yes, please contact reception to make the request, subject to availability. A supplement may apply depending on the desired departure time.

sejour.question: How to arrange a transfer to or from Marrakech-Ménara airport?
sejour.answer: You can book a transfer through our concierge service. Contact us in advance to organize your transfer.

sejour.question: Does Hotel Le Naoura Marrakech offer a valet service?
sejour.answer: Yes, we offer a valet service for your convenience.

sejour.question: Are pets allowed at Hotel Le Naoura?
sejour.answer: Please contact us to learn about our pet policies.

sejour.question: Does the hotel provide baby cots or extra beds?
sejour.answer: Yes, baby cots and extra beds are available upon request, subject to availability.

sejour.question: Does the hotel offer connecting or adjacent rooms?
sejour.answer: Yes, we offer connecting and adjacent rooms. Please contact us for more information.

restaurants.question: Do restaurants require a reservation?
restaurants.answer: We strongly recommend booking in advance, especially for dinner.

restaurants.question: Is there a dress code for restaurants?
restaurants.answer: Smart casual dress code is recommended.

bienetre.question: Is the spa open to non-residents?
bienetre.answer: Yes, the spa is open to residents and non-residents, by reservation.

bienetre.question: What types of treatments are offered?
bienetre.answer: We offer a full range of wellness and relaxation treatments.

experiences.question: Is the medina safe to explore?
experiences.answer: Yes, especially with a certified guide.

experiences.question: Are tours private?
experiences.answer: Most experiences are private unless otherwise indicated.

experiences.question: Can we customize trips?
experiences.answer: Yes, all excursions can be adapted according to guests' preferences.

footer.developer: DEVELOPED BY HWS AUTHENTIC MOROCCAN HOSPITALITY IN THE HEART OF FES

hero.title: Accommodation
hero.subtitle: Rooms and suites designed to offer comfort, authenticity, and the calm atmosphere of a traditional Moroccan home.

section.title: Suites & Rooms
section.subtitle: Find the perfect room for your stay, each offering a blend of handcrafted details and modern amenities.
section.description: The rooms, suites, and ryads of Riad Alassala offer tranquility, proximity to the medina, spaciousness (minimum 46m²), large terraces, pool views, and decoration by Pascal Desp.

superior.name: Dar Superior Room
superior.description: A comfortable room featuring traditional décor, soft tones, and all essential amenities for a relaxing stay.
superior.features: 2 people | 46 m² | King Size | Pool view

patio.name: Patio Suite
patio.description: A spacious suite with a seating area and views over the courtyard, offering privacy and comfort.
patio.features: 2 people | 50 m² | King Size | Courtyard view

rooftop.name: Rooftop Terrace Suite
rooftop.description: A suite with access to the rooftop, perfect for enjoying the medina skyline at sunrise or sunset.
rooftop.features: 2 people | 55 m² | King Size | Rooftop terrace

grand.name: Grand Medina House
grand.description: A multi-room residence ideal for families or long stays, featuring a salon, dining area, and private terrace access.
grand.features: 6 people | 200 m² | Multiple bedrooms | Private terrace

standardDoubleRoom.name: Standard Double Room
standardDoubleRoom.description: A bright double room with Moroccan touches, comfortable bedding, and modern amenities.
standardDoubleRoom.features: 2 people | 30 m² | Double Bed | Private Bathroom

standardDoubleRoom2.name: Standard Double Room (2)
standardDoubleRoom2.description: A second double room option featuring handcrafted details and a calm atmosphere.
standardDoubleRoom2.features: 2 people | 30 m² | Double Bed | Medina View

juniorSuiteS2.name: Junior Suite (S2)
juniorSuiteS2.description: A spacious suite with a small living area and traditional tilework.
juniorSuiteS2.features: 3 people | 50 m² | King Bed | Sitting Area

juniorSuiteS1.name: Junior Suite (S1)
juniorSuiteS1.description: A suite blending Moroccan craftsmanship with comfort, perfect for longer stays.
juniorSuiteS1.features: 3 people | 55 m² | King Bed | Living Space

juniorSuite2mez.name: Junior Suite (2Mez)
juniorSuite2mez.description: A two-level suite with a mezzanine-style bedroom and a lounge area below.

executiveSuite.name: Executive Suite
executiveSuite.description: A large suite with premium furnishings, separate living room, and private terrace access.
executiveSuite.features: 4 people | 80 m² | King Bed | Living Room

duplex.name: Duplex
duplex.description: A two-floor residence designed for families or groups, featuring multiple rooms and salon.
duplex.features: 6 people | 150 m² | Multiple Bedrooms | Private Salon

budgetSingleRoom.name: Budget Single Room
budgetSingleRoom.description: A simple, comfortable room ideal for solo travelers seeking a calm stay in the medina.
budgetSingleRoom.features: 1 person | 20 m² | Single Bed | Private Bathroom

budgetSingleRoom2.name: Budget Single Room (2)
budgetSingleRoom2.description: An additional single room offering essential comfort and authenticity.

hero.title: Meetings & Events
hero.subtitle: Host your gatherings in an authentic Moroccan setting combining intimacy, elegance and warm hospitality.

featured.title: An Exceptional Setting
featured.description: Riad Alassala can be privatized for celebrations, family events, dinners or small professional meetings. Our rooftop, salons and patios provide versatile spaces adapted to your needs.

privatisation.title: Riad Privatization
privatisation.description: Exclusive use of the riad for intimate events, celebrations, or group stays.

rooftop.title: Rooftop Events
rooftop.description: Ideal for photoshoots, dinners, small ceremonies or cocktail gatherings with medina views.

diners.title: Private Dinners
diners.description: A bespoke dining experience in our salons or terraces, perfect for special occasions.

seminars.title: Seminars & Workshops
seminars.description: A calm setting ideal for small meetings, trainings or brainstorming sessions.

services.title: Provided Services
services.description: Decoration, catering, coordination and tailored organization to meet your event needs.

groupOffer.description: Riad Alassala offers comfortable spaces suitable for group stays, meetings and private events.
